featured.text: The reason for doing this was simple: Paperclips were a Norwegian invention whose original function was to bind together.
Brazil’s Environmental Ministry estimates that in 1970, 99 percent of the original Amazon Rainforest remained, but in 2000, only 85 percent.
Winning international fame, however, was neither the original intention nor the main reason why Camake founded the group in 2006.
The original budget for my round-island trip was NT$5,000, but the ______ cost is likely to be 50 percent higher.

other.text: (4) Between 1970 and 2000, what percentage of the original Amazon Rainforest was cut down?
The discovery did not surprise me___(40)__ more than the original request that I should take them off.
In 1979, however, male names were also included because women protested against the original naming 34 for reasons of gender equality.
Why was red chosen as the original color of the bindi?

definition.zh_def: 最初的，未經改變的，或最早的形式。
definition.en_def: The first or earliest form; not derived from something else.
definition.example: The original painting was displayed in the museum.
